body:
This is what I've found from running an electron application with `LD_DEBUG=files` on Ubuntu 16.04 amd64:

```
libnode.so
libpthread.so.0
libgtk-x11-2.0.so.0
libgdk-x11-2.0.so.0

libXi.so.6

libm.so.6
libgcc_s.so.1
libc.so.6
```

Is the above list correct? Do you keep an up to date list similar to the one above? 

Also, some libraries, like `libnode.so`, are included in the final bundle, so don't qualify as external dependencies.

All the required dependencies are listed here:
https://github.com/electron/brightray/blob/master/brightray.gyp#L4

And optional dependencies are:
- libnotify for notifications
- libspeechd for text-to-speech
This is very much appreciated, thanks a lot!
